description:
go.talks: move websocket backend code to its own package

This makes it easier to include it in other programs, like the Tour.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go
File pkg/socket/socket.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go#newcode6
pkg/socket/socket.go:6: // Clients connect to a websocket handler and sends run/kill commands, and
s/sends/send/

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go#newcode7
pkg/socket/socket.go:7: // the the server sends the output and exit status of the running processes.
s/the the/then the/

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go
File pkg/socket/socket.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go#newcode6
pkg/socket/socket.go:6: // Clients connect to a websocket handler and sends run/kill commands, and
On 2013/02/05 01:05:20, gocampoy wrote:
> s/sends/send/

Done.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7297043/diff/2001/pkg/socket/socket.go#newcode7
pkg/socket/socket.go:7: // the the server sends the output and exit status of the running processes.
On 2013/02/05 01:05:20, gocampoy wrote:
> s/the the/then the/

removed one the

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ad29729c589e&repo=talks ***

go.talks: move websocket backend code to its own package

This makes it easier to include it in other programs, like the Tour.

subject: code review 7297043: go.talks: move websocket backend code to its own package
